Subject: Time-Sensitive Items Now Expired
Purpose: This notification is sent when one or more credentials are now expired.

Subject: Time-Sensitive Items Expiring Within 1 Month
Purpose: This notification is sent when one or more credentials are set to expire within the next month.

Subject: Time-Sensitive Items Expiring Within 3 Months
Purpose: This notification is sent when one or more credentials are set to expire within the next 3 months.

Subject: Time-Sensitive Items Expiring Within 2 Months
Purpose: This notification is sent when one or more credentials are set to expire within the next 2 months.

Subject: Added To Waiting List
Purpose: This notification is automatically sent to the person who completes any waitlist request for any class.

Subject: Application Access Granted
Purpose: This notification is sent to a user when access is granted to the platform after being requested.

Subject: Application Access Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a user requests access to the platform.

Subject: Assessment Attempt Completed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when any learner completes any assessment attempt.

Subject: Assessment Attempt Started
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when any learner starts any assessment attempt.

Subject: Authentication Failed (Brute-Force Login Attempt)
Purpose: This alert is sent to admin subscribers when a user fails multiple attempts to sign in to the platform.
This notification is sent after correctly configuring notification notice for bank form.

Subject: Class Reminder
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers before X days of a learner's class to start. (Configured in each event.)

Subject: Class Reminder
Purpose: This notification is sent to an instructor and/or admin subscribers before X days of a instructor's class to start. (Configured in each event.)

Subject: CMDS Blog Subscription
Purpose: n/a

Subject: College Certification Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent when a user requests certification.

Subject: Time-Sensitive Competencies: Expiration Notice
Purpose: This notification is sent after one or more competencies have expired.

Subject: CMDS Competency Changed
Purpose: This notification is sent to an administrator when a CMDS competency is created or modified.

Subject: Validation Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent when a user requests validation on completed assignments from another user.

Subject: Time-Sensitive Safety Certificate: $ChangeType
Purpose: This notification is sent to an administrator when a CMDS Global or Keyera (company-specific) time-sensitive safety certificate is created or modified.

Subject: Validator Training Session Registration
Purpose: n/a

Subject: Course Completed
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a course is completed. (Configured in each course.)

Subject: Course Stalled
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a learner hasn't made progress on a course for the specified time. (Configured in each course.)

Subject: Credential Created
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user that is assigned or granted an achievement.

Subject: Employer Group Created
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when an Employer group is created.

Subject: Employer Opportunity Application Submitted
Purpose: OBSOLETE ALERT

Subject: Event Venue Changed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a group is selected or changed as the venue for an event.
Variables: GroupIdentifier, GroupName, EventIdentifier, EventDate, EventName, EventNumber

Subject: Workflow Assignment - Help Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a portal user completes the Shift iQ Support request form.

Subject: Jobs Candidate Contact Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent to the Candidate when an Employer asks to be connected with them.

Subject: Job Application Submitted
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a Candidate applies for an opportunity.

Subject: Invoice Paid
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user who completes any payment transaction.

Subject: Class Scheduled
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user who purchases an online class product. (SkillsCheck only.)

Subject: Issue Owner Changed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a case owner is assigned or changed on any case.

Subject: ITA {ActivityTitle} - {ActivityDate} - for session {ActivityClassCode} has been scheduled
Purpose: Training Provider Notice - Class Event
RecipientFunction: Training Provider, Instructor, Accessibility and Resource Centre (ARC):Invigilating Office/Invigilator

Subject: ITA Exam Passwords for $ActivityNumber - $ActivityTitle, $ActivityDate
Purpose: Invigilator Notice - Online Only - Class Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} - scheduled on {ActivityDate} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Class Event

Subject: Reminder - ITA {FormTitle} scheduled on {ActivityDate} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Reminder - Class Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} - scheduled on {ActivityDate} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Sitting Event

Subject: Reminder - ITA {FormTitle} - scheduled on {ActivityDate} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Reminder - Sitting Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} scheduled at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Individual Event

Subject: Reminder - ITA {FormTitle} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Reminder - Individual Event

Subject: ITA Exam Review Required - Results withheld for {ActivityType} {ActivityNumber}-{ActivityBillingCode}
Purpose: Administrator Notice - Exam Results Failed Validation

Subject: Reminder - ITA Exam Review Required - Results withheld for {ActivityType} {ActivityNumber}-{ActivityBillingCode}
Purpose: Administrator Reminder - Exam Results Failed Validation

Subject: ITA Exam Results for session {ActivityClassCode} - {FormTitle}, {ActivityDate}
Purpose: Training Provider Notice - Class Event Results

Subject: Outstanding Exam Materials Reminder
Purpose: Invigilator Notice - Outstanding Exam Materials Reminder: 5 Days/10 Days

Subject: Reminder - ITA {FormTitle} at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Reminder - Individual Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} - Candidate Not Eligible
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Class Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} - Candidate Removed
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Class Event

Subject: ITA {ActivityTitle} - {ActivityDate} - for session {ActivityClassCode} has been scheduled
Purpose: Training Provider Notice - Class Event

Subject: ITA {FormTitle} scheduled at {VenueName}
Purpose: Candidate Notice - Individual Event.

Subject: ITA {ActivityTitle} - {ActivityDate} - for session {ActivityClassCode} has been approved
Purpose: Candidate and Training Provider Notice - Class Event

Subject: No Return Shipment Received
Purpose: Invigilator Notice - No Return Shipment Received Reminder: 14/60 days

Subject: Logbook Joined
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner when they join a logbook.(Configured in each logbook.)

Subject: Logbook Modified
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a logbook entry is created or modified.(Configured in each logbook.)

Subject: Group Membership Ended
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a person is removed from a group.(Configured in each group.)

Subject: Group Membership Started
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a person is added to a group. (Configured in each group.)

Subject: Password Changed
Purpose: This alert is sent to any user that changes their password.

Subject: Password Reset Requested
Purpose: This alert is sent to any user that requests a password reset.

Subject: Person Code Was Not Entered
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a class registration was completed without a Person Code.

Subject: Person Flagged on Comment
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a flag is added to any comment on any contact record.

Subject: Program Completed
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a program is completed. (Configured in each program.)

Subject: Program Stalled
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner and/or admin subscribers when a learner hasn't made progress on a program for the specified time. (Configured in each program.)

Subject: Progress Completed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a grade item is completed. (Configured in each grade item.)

Subject: Registrant Contact Information Changed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when any contact information is updated during a class registration.

Subject: Registration Complete
Purpose: This notification is sent to the person who completed a class registration and to the registrant as well, if different.

Subject: Invitation for Registration
Purpose: This notification is sent to the person who requested a class waitlist spot when the Send Invitation button is clicked.

Subject: Registration Invitation Expired
Purpose: This notification is sent to the person who requested a class waitlist spot when the registration invitation has expired or been marked as declined.

Subject: Response Completed
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a survey response is completed. (Configured in each survey.)

Subject: Response Confirmed
Purpose: This notification is sent to a survey respondent when they submit their survey response. (Configured in each survey.)

Subject: Response Started
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers when a survey response is started. (Configured in each survey.)

Subject: Unhandled Exception Intercepted
Purpose: This alert is sent to admin subscribers after an unhandled exception is intercepted (and NOT sent to Sentry).

Subject: Account Archived
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers each time a contact record is archived.

Subject: Account Created
Purpose: This notification is sent to admin subscribers after a new user account is created by another administrator.

Subject: User Account Approved - Welcome!
Purpose: This notification is sent to a user when an admin grants them access to the platform. It can also be sent manually to the user at any time.

Subject: Mailing List Subscriptions Modified
Body:
Hi $RecipientName,

This is an automated notification to confirm your email subscriptions have been updated.

$RecipientMemberships
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user who modifies their own mailing list group memberships. (Configured in each List group.)

Subject: Email Verification Requested
Purpose: This notification is sent to every user that self registers for their own account that is automatically granted access.

Subject: Your verification code from InSite
Purpose: This alert is sent to any user who has multi-factor authentication enabled and is logging in, and it includes a one-time use code.

Subject: User Account Registered
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user who self-registers for a new account, confirming receipt of the registration information.

Subject: Successfully Unsubscribed
Purpose: This notification is sent to any user who unsubscribes themselves from all marketing emails from an organization.

Subject: A new SkillsCheck was assigned to you!
Purpose: This notification is sent to a learner when they are invited to complete a SkillsCheck and provides instructions for accessing their account and dashboard.
